meanings.definition: A quick, jerky movement up and down.
meanings.sent1: The boy's bobs on the trampoline were so fast!
meanings.sent2: The dancer's bobs added excitement to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The bobs of the bouncing ball made it hard to catch.
meanings.sent4: Her heart did little bobs in her chest as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The bobs of the yo-yo mesmerized the children.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is cut short and hangs evenly around the head.
meanings.sent1: Her bobs framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Many people love the classic look of bobs.
meanings.sent3: The wind made her bobs sway like a pendulum.
meanings.sent4: Her bobs were like a neat little halo around her head.
meanings.sent5: The actress's bobs in the movie inspired a new trend.

meanings.definition: A weight attached to a fishing line to sink it in the water.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman attached the bobs to his line.
meanings.sent2: The bobs helped the fishing line sink quickly.
meanings.sent3: The playful seal mistook the bobs for food.
meanings.sent4: The bobs danced in the water as the fisherman cast his line.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bobs attracted the fish to the bait.

meanings.definition: A slang term for British currency.
meanings.sent1: He paid for the souvenir with a few bobs.
meanings.sent2: In the old days, people used bobs for everyday purchases.
meanings.sent3: The bobs jingled in his pocket as he walked.
meanings.sent4: She saved up her bobs for a special occasion.
meanings.sent5: The bobs clinked together as he counted them out.
